statements: SELECT * FROM player_location WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, latitude FROM player_location WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT longitude FROM player_location ORDER BY longitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_location WHERE latitude > 35.0 AND longitude < -75.0;
SELECT player_id, latitude, longitude FROM player_location WHERE player_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM player_location WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT player_id, latitude, longitude FROM player_location WHERE player_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT player_id, latitude, longitude FROM player_location ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(latitude) AS avg_lat, AVG(longitude) AS avg_long FROM player_location;
SELECT player_id, latitude, longitude FROM player_location WHERE latitude < 50 OR longitude > -50;
SELECT * FROM player_locations WHERE latitude > 0.0 AND longitude < 0.0;
SELECT player_id, latitude FROM player_locations WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM player_status WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT player_id, longitude FROM player_locations WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT player_id, latitude, longitude FROM player_locations ORDER BY longitude DESC;
SELECT player_id, latitude, longitude FROM player_locations WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT latitude, longitude, player_id FROM player_locations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT player_id, latitude, longitude FROM player_locations ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, status FROM player_status WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM player_locations JOIN player_status ON player_locations.player_id = player_status.player_id;
SELECT * FROM PlayerLocations;
SELECT player_id, latitude, longitude FROM PlayerLocations WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, experience, health FROM PlayerStats ORDER BY experience DESC;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM PlayerInventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT player_id, health, experience FROM PlayerStats WHERE health < 50;
SELECT player_id, latitude, longitude FROM PlayerLocations WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PlayerStats WHERE health > 50 ORDER BY experience DESC;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM PlayerInventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND quantity > 0;
SELECT player_id, health, experience FROM PlayerStats JOIN PlayerLocations ON PlayerStats.player_id = PlayerLocations.player_id WHERE health > 50 AND latitude < 40;
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_items FROM PlayerInventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_items > 10 ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_locations;
SELECT player_id, latitude, longitude FROM player_locations WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT player_name, join_time FROM game_players WHERE join_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, player_id, start_time FROM game_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_id, games_played, total_score FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played > 10 AND total_score > 1000;
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM game_players JOIN player_statistics ON game_players.player_id = player_statistics.player_id
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played >= 10 ORDER BY total_score DESC
SELECT player_name, start_time, end_time FROM game_players JOIN game_sessions ON game_players.player_id = game_sessions.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT player_name, latitude, longitude FROM game_players JOIN player_locations ON game_players.player_id = player_locations.player_id WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100
SELECT player_id, player_name, games_played, total_score FROM game_players JOIN player_statistics ON game_players.player_id = player_statistics.player_id WHERE games_played BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT * FROM player_locations ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE num_players < 10;
SELECT player_id, games_won, games_lost FROM game_statistics WHERE games_won > games_lost;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM game_map ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT player_name FROM players WHERE player_level > 5
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC
SELECT player_name, games_won, games_lost FROM players JOIN game_statistics ON players.player_id = game_statistics.player_id
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM game_map WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT player_id, COUNT(session_id) AS num_sessions FROM game_sessions GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_sessions > 5
